name: Sony Headphone
detail:
The Sonic B Heroic Gaming Wired Headset includes a built-in microphone for hands-free talking and playing. The headset includes a mute switch, volume control features and pro-light illuminated LED ear clips. Pro-tested sweat proof with a flexible microphone that bends to your desired position, this headset is perfect for gamers!

- Built-in microphone for hands-free talking/playing.
- Microphone noise reduction
- Enhanced treble and bass
- On-ear comfort for long listening
- Compatible with Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch, Mobiles/Tablets
